abstract: Goldman Sachs, JPMorgan Chase and Morgan Stanley are among Wall Street investment firms vying to manage the sovereign wealth fund being established by oil-rich Nigeria.
snippet: Goldman Sachs, JPMorgan Chase and Morgan Stanley are among Wall Street investment firms vying to manage the sovereign wealth fund being established by oil-rich Nigeria.

headline.main: Wall St. Giants Seek a Piece of Nigeria's Sovereign Fund
headline.print_headline: Aiming for a Piece of Nigeria’s Portfolio
